tutorial.introduction: The Tabs app saves space on your page by allowing content to be displayed in separate tabs within a single element.
content: Decide upon the number of tabs to display. You can have up to ten tabs in a single element, each with its own content.
Choose a style and colors for your tabs. There are four different themes to pick from, and you can select colors for the borders and tabs in each style.

Start adding content to your tabs. Click on a tab to enter a title for it, then drag elements into the content area. Each tabâ€™s content area behaves like a page in Weebly, so you can add multiple elements and position them in the same way.
